root.name: Twisted Lands: Shadow Town
root.description: OverviewTwisted Lands: Shadow Town is a hidden objects game and the first in the Twisted Lands franchise.PlotThe player is controlling a man who, along with his wife have crash landed on a mysterious island. A large abandoned ship is seen in the distance with a huge hole in the hull. The player then goes to explore the ship and try to find his wife.GameplayIn Twisted Lands: Shadow Town each scene is a static background with interactive items. The player uses a point and click interface to find a list of hidden objects and to solve puzzles.
